descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16690-1-1336485842.jpg[/img]

A new carving technique has enabled Dragons slayers to find specific scales and bones that are very strong. Better still a technique of fusing together flame bones and scales makes a Flame Dragon Gem that can be infused to make even stronger armour than normal or Ice Dragon armour.

----------------------------------------------------------

This Mod adds new armour, items, crafting to the game... And balanced so only the most advanced player will be able to craft them.

The Flame Dragon armour is the strongest in the series of Dragon armour and therefore will require 1 extra ingredient in order to balance gameplay.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16690-5-1336485856.jpg[/img]

----------------------------------------------

Version 1.0

- Add Flame Dragon armour
- Add Flame Dragon bones & Scales
- Add Flame Dragon Gem ( Loot-able only from Boss dragon and creatable using dragon bones & Scales )
- Flame dragon armour protects from Fire attacks

----------------------------------------------

This file is part of a pack of Dragon armour elemental... Here is the frost version

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16583
author: Misa Jackson
